general_advisory: In view of weather forecast by IMD, farmers are advised to withhold sowing operation for the time being and to resume the sowing soon after receding of rain by utilizing available soil moisture. In view of the above forecast, farmers advised to avoid the application of fertilizers and pesticides in standing crops until receding of rainfall. Make arrangements for draining out excess water from the field of Maize, Arhar, Groundnut, and vegetables. Harvest the matured vegetables before the impending rain. Protect the vegetable seedlings in the nursery from heavy rain by covering with plastic or polythene sheet over the nursery bed.
